name: Mechanical_Intelligence_2001
description:
IntelligenceZ is happy to announce our new invention. Most people know that the testing procedure is important in order to maintain safe and secure environment, and we made it possible with this program. Free to download, accessible for every computer owner due to its simple installment and easy interface, along with our best instructor always ready to help - that is what makes "Mechanical Intelligence 2001" the best solution available!

Сaution: may contain mentions of death.  Viewer discretion is advised.
